conversation.name: user1
conversation.message: Hi Ansh, What is the update for the project, Abhinav is interested in details

conversation.name: user2
conversation.message: Hi, Kushi. Yeah, everything is good. Just allow me some time, then I will present the screen.

conversation.name: user1
conversation.message: Sure, take your time. Let me know if you need any assistance.

conversation.name: user1
conversation.message: No problem. By the way, have you reviewed the latest design changes?

conversation.name: user2
conversation.message: Yes, I did. They look good overall, but I have a few suggestions. I'll discuss them with you.

conversation.name: user1
conversation.message: Sure, we can discuss them during our next meeting. Do you think we can finalize the design by end of this week?

conversation.name: user2
conversation.message: Possibly, but let's keep some buffer in case we encounter unexpected issues.

conversation.name: user1
conversation.message: Agreed. It's always better to be prepared. Let's aim for Friday as the tentative deadline.

conversation.name: user2
conversation.message: Sounds good. I'll prioritize accordingly to meet the deadline.

conversation.name: user1
conversation.message: Perfect. Thanks for your dedication, Kushi. Looking forward to the successful completion of this project!

conversation.name: user2
conversation.message: Thank you, Ansh. It's a team effort, and I'm confident we'll deliver excellence.

conversation.name: user1
conversation.message: Absolutely! Let's keep up the great work.
